tool.name: tabulate_exclusions

param.name: in_Tabs
param.dialogReference: Input spreadsheet(s) in CSV format. Must have standardized fields or this tool will fail.

param.name: out_Tab
param.dialogReference: Output table in a geodatabase, compiled from the inputs

tool.summary: From a set of input spreadsheets which have standardized fields and have been converted to CSV format, creates a list of elements to exclude from "Essential Conservation Sites" processing,

dataIdInfo.idAbs: From a set of input spreadsheets which have standardized fields and have been converted to CSV format, creates a list of elements to exclude from "Essential Conservation Sites" processing,
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Virginia Natural Heritage Program (Kirsten R. Hazler)
